SourceProxy.name: DaxContour
SourceProxy.label: Dax Contour

Documentation.long_help: Generate isolines or isosurfaces using point scalars.

SourceProxy.Documentation: The Dax Marching Cubes filter computes isolines or isosurfaces using a selected point-centered scalar array. It behaves similarly to the standard Contour filter but uses Dax's finely threaded parallel algorithms.

InputProperty.name: Input
InputProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the input dataset to be used by the contour filter.

StringVectorProperty.label: Contour By
StringVectorProperty.name: SelectInputScalars
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the name of the scalar array from which the contour filter will compute isolines and/or isosurfaces.

DoubleVectorProperty.label: Isosurfaces
DoubleVectorProperty.name: ContourValues
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the values at which to compute isosurfaces/isolines and also the number of such values.

IntVectorProperty.name: ComputeScalars
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: If this property is set to 1, an array of scalars (containing the contour value) will be added to the output dataset. If set to 0, the output will not contain this array.

SourceProxy.name: DaxThreshold
SourceProxy.label: Dax Threshold

Documentation.long_help: This filter extracts cells that have point or cell scalars in the specified range.
Documentation.short_help: Extract cells that satisfy a threshold criterion.

SourceProxy.Documentation: The Dax Threshold filter extracts cells with a field that meets a certain criteria. It behaves similarly to the standard Contour filter but uses Dax's finely threaded parallel algorithms.

InputProperty.name: Input
InputProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the input to the Threshold filter.

StringVectorProperty.label: Scalars
StringVectorProperty.name: SelectInputScalars
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: The value of this property contains the name of the scalar array from which to perform thresholding.

DoubleVectorProperty.label: Threshold Range
DoubleVectorProperty.name: ThresholdBetween
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: The values of this property specify the upper and lower bounds of the thresholding operation.
